RECYCLED AND NEW
COUTURE FASHIONS

“La Deuxieme Fois” is the French term for “The Second Time”. We have been trading for 30 years and are the premier destination for high end fashion labels. We are proud to o er new and near new couture fashions, from some of the worldâ€™s most admired and respected designers.

Additional to ladies and men’s fashions, we offer shoes, hats, belts, hand bags, costume jewellery, scarves and so much more.

We welcome you to visit our beautiful store in Double Bay.
